TopicTitle: Can someone give me a list

Articles.Content:
Can I get a list of mods that have:

Bombs

Missiles

Machine guns

Cannons

Miniguns

Romfarers Lazor system's Lazor guided weapons pack is the closest your going to get, also pirates "pirated weapons pack" which is an updated version of jellycubes JAWRD weapons pack, but it hasn't been updated to .20 yet you'll need to your self (just add PART tags and organize the folders in the new format
